SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_GETUNPAID_SPONSOREDCHILDREN_FORSPONSOR
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Gets Unpaid Sponsored children for the given sponsor
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_GETUNPAID_SPONSOREDCHILDREN_FORSPONSOR ( -- Add the parameters for the function here @sponsorId uniqueidentifier ) returns @SponsoredChildrenTable TABLE ( -- Add the column definitions for the TABLE variable here childId uniqueidentifier ) with execute as caller as begin -- get the actively sponsored children for this sponsor, that have the current sponsorship status value -- of Unpaid Sponsored, make sure they're children and not project sponsorships:
insert @SponsoredChildrenTable select soc.ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIP s left join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD soc on s.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = soc.ID join dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION ON dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION.ID = s.ID join dbo.USR_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE ON dbo.USR_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE.ID = dbo.USR_SPONSORSHIPEXTENSION.CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODEID and dbo.USR_CURRENTOPPORTUNITYSPONSORSHIPSTATUSCODE.[DESCRIPTION] = N'Unpaid Sponsored' where (STATUSCODE = 1 and s.CONSTITUENTID = @sponsorId and s.STATUSCODE = 1 and soc.ID is not NULL)
return end
